title: Tazza
markings: Marks: vase in lozenge, bearded head, and ODIOT. A PARIS
provenance: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
dimensions: H x diam.: 27 x 33 cm (10 5/8 x 13 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde
description: Scrolled base with four pairs of seated figures representing the Four Continents; arms of Solomon Rothschiled (1774-1885).

tombstone.epitaph:
Tazza.
Silver. Gift of the Estate of James Hazen Hyde. 1960-1-22.
